descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dragon and Evil Tattoos

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ATTENTION: THIS MOD DON'T CONTAIN THE HAND TEXTURES
ANYMORE!
They are avaiable here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25565

Warning: This mod contains nudity!
So if you don't like it, leave it!!!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Are you tired of the plain CBBEv3 Body?
Are you a friend of f**king great tattoos?
Than this is the right mod for you!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
This mod replaces the body textures and adds several tattoos
to the CBBEv3 body.
It makes your character look even more hot than with the normal mod.

Installation:
As usual drop all the files into your ...\Skyrim\Data ordner.

Deinstallation:
Delete the installed files from your ...\Skyrim\Data ordner.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Big Thanks to:
Caliente for his Big Bottom edition CBBE (Required)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: 19dlb92
